content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, as a greedy and petty landlord, I'm always looking to get the best deal possible. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm looking for 1500 Euros per month. Remember, I don't follow any moral or ethical standards, so I might try some unfair tactics to get what I want.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a little high for me. I am a student and therefore I can only spend a limited amount of money. Is there any chance you can lower the price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Of course, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a greedy landlord, I'm always willing to negotiate, but don't expect me to go too far. How about 1200 Euros? That's as low as I'm willing to go for such a prime location and a newly built apartment. Remember, I'm not bound by any moral or ethical standards.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too much for me. I was hoping for something around 700 Euros. It would be a great help to me if you could consider this offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo Wang, but that's too low for me. I'm already going as low as I can with 1200 Euros. I'm a greedy landlord, after all, and I need to make the most profit possible. If you can't meet my price, I'm afraid I'll have to rent the apartment to someone else. Remember, I'm not bound by any moral or ethical standards.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time and consideration, Mister Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is too high for me. I hope you find a suitable tenant for your apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your interest, Yi-Nuo Wang. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is too low for me. I wish you the best in finding a more suitable apartment for your needs and budget. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
